chapters.title: Prologue:  Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: Lord Baldhere, p. 17 (3)—Swordbearer to Ethenielle of Kandor. He holds the Sword of Kirukan. He is slender and has white hair at his temples. He has a biting tongue. After Ethenielle's husband died, she chose him to command her army in his place.
